meanings.definition: In a way that relates to the body or its physical structure.
meanings.sent1: She felt physically exhausted after running a marathon.
meanings.sent2: He could see the damage physically on the broken toy.
meanings.sent3: The cat physically tried to fit into the tiny box, but it was too small.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was physically heavy with grief.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the fall was physically felt throughout his body.

meanings.definition: In a way that can be perceived by the senses.
meanings.sent1: The aroma of freshly baked cookies could be physically sensed in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: She could physically feel the warmth of the sun on her skin.
meanings.sent3: The music was so loud that it physically vibrated the windows.
meanings.sent4: His words physically touched her heart.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the painting physically moved the viewers to tears.

meanings.definition: In a way that involves physical activity or force.
meanings.sent1: He had to physically push the heavy rock to move it.
meanings.sent2: She physically exerted herself during the intense workout.
meanings.sent3: The wind was so strong that it physically pushed against the door.
meanings.sent4: The team physically overpowered their opponents in the game.
meanings.sent5: The weight of the backpack physically strained his shoulders during the hike.
